description:
Noah Judson

Slides: http://linuxfestnorthwest.org/sites/default/files/slides/2015-04-23-linuxfest-bitcoin-prez.odp

The block chain is the revolutionary technology that Bitcoin is built upon. In this session, we’ll cover how the block chain functions from a developer’s perspective along with how to get started using Bitcoind, the command-line interface used to work with the block chain.
title: LinuxFest Northwest 2015: Bitcoin Development: Getting Started on the Block Chain
